channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Keeps Winning - How Much Longer Can Jeffries Hold on As Dems Rack Up Losses?

item.description: A Republican lawmaker on Thursday proposed that President Donald Trump be added to Mount Rushmore.

item.title: Washington Post: Gabbard's Ethics Claim About Journalist Unfounded
item.description: The Washington Post on Thursday pushed back on Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard's claim that its reporter "harassed" her staff.

item.title: Time for Biden to Step Off the Stage, for Good
Rasmussen: Harris Leads Dems for 2028 Presidential Run
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris leads the race for the Democratic Party's 2028 presidential nominee, Rasmussen Reports results showed Thursday.
